div.h4: Please know all playgrounds at Denver Community Schools are closed until further notice.
Grab & Go meals will be available for pick up on Mondays and Wednesdays each week from 11:00AM – 12:00PM
div.p: Please pull in front of the lower elementary doors (formerly the Supt/Business Office entrance). Please stay in your vehicle. When you pull up, roll your window down and let our staff know how many students you signed up. The staff will place the bagged meals in the vehicle’s trunk. We encourage only one person per family come and pick up for the family. Just need to let them know how many children you signed up.

a.span: School Closure Lunch Assistance for ALL students - Please sign up HERE!

span.span: As a district, we have designed a proactive educational approach that will provide opportunities for students, parents, teachers, and administrators to work together as a team to provide optional educational resources for the students of Denver School District.
